Codeforces Round 333 (Div. 2)


A. Two Bases
time limit per test: 1 second
memory limit per test: 256 megabytes
input: standard input
output: standard output

Examples
Input
6 2
1 0 1 1 1 1
2 10
4 7
Output
=
Input
3 3
1 0 2
2 5
2 4
Output
<
Input
7 16
15 15 4 0 0 7 10
7 9
4 8 0 3 1 5 0
Output
>
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
B. Approximating a Constant Range
time limit per test: 2 seconds
memory limit per test: 256 megabytes
input: standard input
output: standard output

Examples
Input
5
1 2 3 3 2
Output
4
Input
11
5 4 5 5 6 7 8 8 8 7 6
Output
5
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
C. The Two Routes
time limit per test: 2 seconds
memory limit per test: 256 megabytes
input: standard input
output: standard output

Examples
Input
4 2
1 3
3 4
Output
2
Input
4 6
1 2
1 3
1 4
2 3
2 4
3 4
Output
-1
Input
5 5
4 2
3 5
4 5
5 1
1 2
Output
3
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
D. Lipshitz Sequence
time limit per test: 1 second
memory limit per test: 256 megabytes
input: standard input
output: standard output

Examples
Input
10 4
1 5 2 9 1 3 4 2 1 7
2 4
3 8
7 10
1 9
Output
17
82
23
210
Input
7 6
5 7 7 4 6 6 2
1 2
2 3
2 6
1 7
4 7
3 5
Output
2
0
22
59
16
8
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
